tool_description: Analyzes incident data, evidence, and contributing factors to identify root causes using systematic investigation methodologies.

analysis_method.description: Analysis methodology: five_whys, fishbone, fault_tree, change_analysis, barrier_analysis

error_messages: Invalid incident ID: Incident ID must correspond to an existing investigation case.
Invalid analysis method: Must be one of [five_whys, fishbone, fault_tree, change_analysis, barrier_analysis].
Insufficient factors: At least one contributing factor must be provided.
Too many factors: Maximum 20 contributing factors can be analyzed simultaneously.
Missing analyst information: Analyst name is required for analysis validation.
usage: Provide incident_id, analysis_method, contributing_factors array, and analyst_name. Uses systematic methodology to identify root causes from investigation data.

analysis_id.description: Unique identifier for the root cause analysis
